hero.title: Compress Images.
hero.subtitle: Without Sacrificing Privacy.
hero.description: No server uploads. No data collection.

features.privacy_desc: Your files never leave this device. No servers peeking at your data.
features.speed_desc: No waiting for uploads or downloads. Compression happens instantly.
features.quality_desc: Smart algorithms reduce file size without destroying image details.

how_it_works.title: Under the Hood
how_it_works.step1_desc: We use WebAssembly to run compression logic directly in your browser. No data travels to our servers.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Your images are analyzed and optimized using industry-standard codecs without losing visual clarity.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Once finished, the optimized file is saved straight to your downloads folder automatically.

compatibility.title: Works Everywhere
compatibility.browser_desc: Full support for Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari. No plugins required.
compatibility.device_desc: Optimized for Desktop, Tablet, and Mobile. Process images on the go.
compatibility.offline_desc: After the first load, this app works even without an internet connection.

stats.security_desc: By moving the logic to your browser, we eliminate 100% of data breach risks. No upload = No leak.
